name: Hobgoblin Lore
summary: You’ve studied traditional hobgoblin exercises and fieldcraft, all of which have a militaristic bent.
description:
You’ve studied traditional hobgoblin exercises and fieldcraft, all of which have a militaristic bent. You become trained in Athletics and Crafting. For each of these skills in which you were already trained, you become trained in a skill of your choice. You also become trained in Hobgoblin Lore.Traits

Hobgoblin: Hobgoblins are a sturdy, clever people with a propensity for militaristic order
